Package src.usr

Class Accounts

Object
Accounts
public class Accounts extends Object
This static class manages all accounts, both movie-goers and admin accounts. Consequently, the class will be used to whenever a new account is created. Login verification and account retrieval methods will also be completed here. No instance of this class should be created, since all accounts are stored together and global.
Since:
2022-11-13
Version:
1.4
Author:
Jun Xiong

      public static int isValid(boolean admin, String username, String pw)

    • getAdminAcc

      public static Admin getAdminAcc(int index)
      Obtain admin account from storage given its index. Used for login. This function MUST only be called after calling on validAcc().
      Parameters:
      index - index of the admin account
      Returns:
      the Admin object

    • getGoerAcc

      public static MovieGoer getGoerAcc(int index)
      Obtain moviegoer account from storage given its index. Used for login. This function MUST only be called after calling on validAcc().
      Parameters:
      index - index of the movie goer account
      Returns:
      the movie goer account
